title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.91 - Depreciation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.91 - Depreciation

State Regulations

Lost usefulness; expired utility; the diminution of
service yield from a fixed asset or fixed-asset group that cannot or will not
be restored by repairs or by replacement of parts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.91

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
